data.sentence: The word مِنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.
data.sentence: The word كُلِّ comes from the root ك ل ل and is associated with the meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.

data.meanings: To guard, protect, take care of, watch, put in store, preserve, learn by heart.
data.sentence: The word وَحَفِظْنَاهَا comes from the root ح ف ظ and is associated with the meanings: To guard, protect, take care of, watch, put in store, preserve, learn by heart.

data.meanings: to stone, cast stones, stone to death, curse, revile, expel, put a stone (on a tomb), speak conjecturally, guess, surmise. rajmun - conjecture, guesswork, missile. rujum - shooting stars, throw off, damned, thrown off with curse. marajim - foul speech. marjum - stoned.
data.sentence: The word رَجِيمٍ comes from the root ر ج م and is associated with the meanings: to stone, cast stones, stone to death, curse, revile, expel, put a stone (on a tomb), speak conjecturally, guess, surmise. rajmun - conjecture, guesswork, missile. rujum - shooting stars, throw off, damned, thrown off with curse. marajim - foul speech. marjum - stoned.
